entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow mixed with freezing drizzle. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow or freezing drizzle beginning early this evening. Risk of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow mixed with freezing drizzle. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or freezing drizzle ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
